title: R{{ROUND_NUMBER}} Prepare Round - Add new Funding Round to Airtable.
body:
- [ ] Create new category on Port

- Make sure new Funding Round is configured correctly inside Airtable, and fill the following fields
 - [ ] Round number
 - [ ] Vote Type
 - [ ] Ballot type
 - [ ] Start date
 - [ ] Proposal Due By
 - [ ] Voting Starts
 - [ ] Voting Ends
 - [ ] Funding Deadline
 - [ ] Basis Currency
 - [ ] Discourse Category

title: R{{ROUND_NUMBER}} Prepare Round - Configure Funding Round.
body:
Update the following Funding Round parameters inside the [Airtable Funding Rounds Table](https://airtable.com/appVer8ccYGnqSm2H/tbliawPTKlmd1lVA5/viwcabfq70TWi2BVz?blocks=hide). You need to get these from the Parameters-Roadmap WG.
 - [ ] Earmarks
 - [ ] Funding Tiers
 - [ ] Funding Available

title: R{{ROUND_NUMBER}} OPS - Town Halls
body:
### Monthly Ops:
Start ahead of time by [learning how to record and publish videos](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1uQIr-qVejRBskKXsz9qEmc5kOEgBYjFvq2mif1UJmQU/edit?usp=sharing) and configuring the Town Hall wiki page that contains all required THs for this round.
- [ ] Copy from existing TH pages and prepare multiple [Town Hall wiki pages](https://github.com/oceanprotocol/oceandao/wiki/OceanDAO-Town-Hall) for Round {{ROUND_NUMBER}}.

### Weekly Ops:

Right after each Town Hall ends, you can start preparing materials for the next Town Hall. Because it's always evolving, we're always building on previous presentations.

_NOTE: You may not have all the information to complete this ahead of time, so complete as much of the following deliverables as early as possible, and then revisit this before the TH date when the remaining information is available, to complete it._
 - [ ] Copy latest TH presentation inside of GDrive and update the TH number, date, and other basic information.
- [ ] Update new TH presentation to be contextual to the data that becomes available as the Round {{ROUND_NUMBER}} Ops proceeds - Starting, Completing, Winners, etc...
- [ ] Update new TH presentation to contain all Community Updates and Deep Shares.
- [ ] Update the individual TH page and link to the new presentation.
- [ ] Share new TH presentation internally + with community ahead of time, for others to edit.
- [ ] Create TownHall event inside Discord Events.
- [ ] Share TH reminder to OPF + Twitter + Discord: "TH event happening in the next 24 hours".
- [ ] Share TH reminder to OPF + Twitter + Discord: "TH event happening in the next 1 hour".
- [ ] Record Town Hall with OBS + Upload video to GDrive.
- [ ] Link the new TH page to the recording once it's available.
- [ ] Comms/Announce link to new TH page that includes the most recent presentation and recording.

How to do the live-ops [video](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1dtv3eb6MGU5gwrQpz7nAuRLvaqTqn_T-/view?usp=sharing)

body: - [ ] Integrate GSheet for Round {{ROUND_NUMBER}} in the Notion Voting Page

title: R{{ROUND_NUMBER}} Conclusion Part 1a - Distribute Funding
body:
## Overview:
The results from the voting period, all adjustments, and required calculations should now be completed and signed-off on.

At this point, the Finance and Engineering team can configure the distribute, fund the treasury, and make all required announcements to roll out the funds.

### Goals:
1. Funding has been released by the finance team.
2. The claim contract has been configured by the engineering team.
3. The engineering team has made the announcement internally.
4. The ops/comms team has amplified the announcement.

### DoD: Engineering
Please complete these in order:
- [ ] Generate hash keys for the winners.
- [ ] Fund the treasury contract that distributes the funds.
- [ ] Update DB w/ Hash Keys so Users can finally Claim their Grant.
- [ ] Announce Treasury being funded and grants being available to OceanDAO.

### DoD: Comms
After work above is completed, amplify announcement from `#ocean-dao`:
- [ ] Amplify Treasury Funded announcement on Twitter

title: R{{ROUND_NUMBER}} Conclusions Part 1b - Communication
body:
## Overview:
The Funding Round is coming to an end and the Final Results need to be announced at the very end. Any adjustments and calculations should be getting resolved instantly so everything downstream can kick off, including celebrating this very special moment!


### Goals:
1. Formally conclude the Funding Round with a blog post, and make an announcement to all participants that need to claim their grant.
2. Highlight sources of information that might benefit participants from knowing about. These may include: OceanDAO news, upcoming features, products and services that connect to this moment (Seed, Pearl, Wiki, How-Tos, Videos).

### DoD: Comms
- [ ] Write a blog post summarizing Funding Round Results, Winners, and interesting information that participants may benefit from being informed of.
- [ ] Improve the following templated e-mail and send it to all participants of R{{ROUND_NUMBER}}.  

---

> SUBJECT: OceanDAO Round {{ROUND_NUMBER}} - Next Steps
>
> Hello OceanDAO contributor,
> 
> thank you for participating in OceanDAO Round {{ROUND_NUMBER}}!
> 
> If you did not receive a grant this round, we highly encourage you to keep on building, and apply for another grant in the next round.
>
> If you did win a grant, congratulations!
>
> Regardless of your outcome, this email will help you with taking next steps to continue progressing inside OceanDAO.
> 
> CLAIMING YOUR GRANT:  
> If you won any funding, do not forget to claim your grant. You can do so by [clicking here to go to our portal](https://oceanprotocol.com/web3Tools#ClaimGrant).
> 
> GRANT CLAIM DEADLINE:  
> The funding deadline is {{ROUND_CLAIM_GRANTS_DUE_DATE}}. After this date, we may collect the funds or take other actions that may keep you from accessing your funds.
> 
> KEEP GROWING:  
> Below are various recommendations to continue improving your chances to receive funding in OceanDAO.
> 1. Join our Discord Channel (updates, clarify questions, join working groups, sync with ecosystem projects and Ocean core team members)  
> 2. Come say hi in our project guiding channel in our Discord (Find support, connections, feedback on your project, etc.)  
> 3. Attend Town Halls (learn about the latest developments in OceanDAO, grantee updates, deep shares,..)  
> 4. Get vocal: (Share your updates in our Discord amplify channel, request to do a grantee update during Town Hall in ocean-dao channel, request a deep share,..)  
>
> Thank you for contributing to OceanDAO!

---

title: R{{ROUND_NUMBER}} Conclusions Part 2 - Version Release
body:
## Overview
At this point, our release has been deployed to production and we have pushed all the code to main. This is likely going to be after [Voting Ends] and [Distribute Funds].

Now, we need to version our release, and make sure our dev branches are up-to-date with the latest release. To do this, we follow the last steps of the [Gitflow Workflow](https://www.atlassian.com/git/tutorials/comparing-workflows/gitflow-workflow) so we can have everything sync'd to our release.

### Goals:
- Version main branches of repositories that released code as part of this deployment.
- Update staging/development branches by merging main back in.

### DOD: Engineering
We currently follow this process across 2 repos: 
- Daobot
- Oceandao-proposal-portal

#### For Each Repository:
- [ ] Head of Main branch should point to release.  
- [ ] Create new Tag & Draft new Release.  
- [ ] Merge Release branch back into development and staging branches as required.  

### DOD: Ops Team
After 2 weeks, and engineering close their tasks.
- [ ] Send out Email to anyone who was unable to claim their grant to use Request.Finance.
- [ ] Work with OPF Finance team to resolve any final requests.

title: R{{ROUND_NUMBER}} Conclusions Part 3 - Finalize Funding
body:
## Overview
At this tage funding has been distributed to our treasury and we're providing ops to complete the process.

Goals:
- High % of grantees are claiming.
- Manual tasks and reminders are being automated and abstracted into seed portal.

### DOD: Engineering
- [ ] After 1 week. Run script to update claimers & airtable
- [ ] After 2 weeks. Run script to update claimers & airtable.

### DOD: Ops Team
After 2 weeks, and engineering close their tasks.
- [ ] Send out Email to anyone who was unable to claim their grant to use Request.Finance.
- [ ] Work with OPF Finance team to resolve any final requests.
